commits.content:
{
  "crops": [
    {
      "name": "Teff",

      "row_spacing_cm": 20,
      "plant_spacing_cm": 5,
      "growing_days": 120,
      "description": "Ethiopia's staple grain, used for injera bread",
      "planting_tips": "Broadcast seeds evenly. Best planted at onset of rainy season."
    },
    {
      "name": "Wheat",
      "name_am": "ስንዴ",

      "plant_spacing_cm": 5,

      "description": "Major cereal crop for bread and pasta",
      "planting_tips": "Plant in well-drained soil. Avoid waterlogging."
    },
    {
      "name": "Maize",

      "plant_spacing_cm": 30,
      "growing_days": 120,
      "description": "Versatile crop for food, feed, and fuel",
      "planting_tips": "Plant 2-3 seeds per hole. Thin to strongest seedling."
    },
    {
      "name": "Sorghum",

      "plant_spacing_cm": 20,

      "planting_tips": "Excellent for dry areas. Deep root system."
    },
    {
      "name": "Barley",

      "planting_tips": "Prefers cooler highland climates."
    },
    {
      "name": "Chickpea",
